trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated"></xref>和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>中的項目時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>建立控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is data bound to a source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>中的項目時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項已資料繫結至來源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of DataListItemEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 DataListItemEventArgs 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs>的新執行個體使用這個建構函式

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following property is initialized to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs>建立呼叫這個建構函式時，由下列屬性會初始化為指定的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object that represents an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref>物件，表示中的項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the referenced item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考的項目中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項時引發事件時。

trans-unit.source: The items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are referenced as each item is created or bound to the control.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項所參考，因為每個項目是建立或繫結至控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to programmatically access the referenced item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式存取 參考的項目中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The referenced item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在參考的項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項時引發事件時。
